Texki-developers/Dopa-Main.summary: Recent activities involve numerous push events and pull requests, focusing on feature additions, bug fixes, and integration with Strapi. Key updates include adding a new course, removing the footer, revalidating APIs, and implementing Strapi interface. These changes indicate ongoing development and enhancement of the repository.

Texki-developers/dopa-strapi-panel.summary: The repository has undergone recent updates, including push events that added a database (db) and a feature for the home page. Although the activities are less frequent compared to Dopa-Main, they suggest progress in the repository's development and maintenance.

profile_summary:
Rishad is a highly skilled and innovative software developer, renowned for his exceptional proficiency in JavaScript, TypeScript, and Swift. With a strong portfolio of 47 public repositories, he has consistently demonstrated his ability to design, develop, and deliver high-quality solutions that exceed expectations. As a driven and seasoned professional, Rishad has built a reputation for his technical expertise, adapting seamlessly to new technologies and collaborating effectively to drive project success.

As a respected member of the development community, Rishad has garnered a loyal following of 9 peers who value his insight and expertise. By day, he applies his vast knowledge to craft robust, scalable applications that meet the needs of diverse clients and industries. By night, his passion for hacking fuels his exploration of new technologies and innovative problem-solving approaches. With a unique blend of technical prowess, creative vision, and collaborative spirit, Rishad is an invaluable asset to any development team, poised to drive innovation and growth in the tech landscape.
